PyClicker27 is an efficient and lightweight autoclicker tool.
It is designed to automate repetitive clicking and keypress tasks.
It allows users to customize click intervals, durations, target locations, and even simulate keypresses, making it ideal for gaming, testing, or productivity purposes. The tool is easy to use, with a simple interface and support for hotkeys to start and stop the clicking or keypress process. 
PyClicker27 is built with Python, ensuring cross-platform compatibility and flexibility for various use cases.
